info.title: Invoice Ninja API
info.description: An open-source invoicing and time-tracking app built with Laravel

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: search clients by their email address

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: number of results returned per page

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: page number of results to return when the results are paginated

parameters.name: updated_at
parameters.description: Timestamp used as a filter to only show recently updated records
